title: OnOptions
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Sam Altman sometimes wishes OpenAI were public so haters could short the stock—‘I would love to see them get burned on that’
items.description: Despite reports, Altman said OpenAI has no specific timeline on going public.

items.title: Elon Musk’s Solution to Data Centers: Just Put Them in Space

items.title: Cybercriminals are stooping to a new low by targeting job seekers when the market is already bad: ‘Where’s the good sheep for the wolf to go attack?’
items.description: DNSFilter found 8,724 malicious domains containing the word “jobs,” with the overwhelming majority (86%) newly registered or observed.

items.title: Most Gen-Z Employees See Traditional Career Paths Coming to an End
items.description: New survey data finds many Gen Zers pursuing multiple gigs as an alternative to long careers and working for a single employer.
